titleStmt.title: The righteous taken away from the evil to come applied to the death of the late excellent Queen, in a sermon preach'd at St. Martin's Church, on Sunday, January the twentieth, 1694/5, before the mayor, baliffs, and commonalty of the city of Oxford / by White Kennett ...
titleStmt.author: Kennett, White, 1660-1728.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, for George West ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
